text: (aur svargavaasiyon kee or sanket karenge ki) kya yahee ve log nahin hain, jinake sambandh mein tum shapath lekar kah rahe the ki allaah inhen apanee daya mein se kuchh nahin dega? (aaj unase kaha ja raha hai ki) svarg mein pravesh kar jao, na tumapar kisee prakaar ka bhay hai aur na tum udaaseen hoge
